name: 8Bit Fiesta
description: 8Bit Fiesta brings everything you need to the table with its action packed local multiplayer mayhem including a built in drinking game! Choose between a ton of characters and challenge your friends and prove yourself worthy the title "King of the Fiesta".
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2.0 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb dedicated video memory card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Needs online mulitplayer...  Edit: Ok ok, Sorry for the short and stupid(ish) reveiw at first. Yes, I would love the game even more if it had online muliplayer, but the game its self is really fun, reminds me of a supermeat boy with some witty comedy here and there.  Though its 'Not as good as Dark Souls' You will die like you are in Dark Souls. You will die a lot, and probably curse at your screen on more than one occasion.
Its a VERY but VERY good game. need online multiplayer, but it is fantastic! 11/10  Die to adulf shitler
I wouldn't recommend this game to my damn enemies.
Hands down the greatest game to play on steam with yours friends its absolutely hilarious get it already!!!
beautifully evil so far,something about dying 20 times is so much more fun in 8 bit.   star star star star
